item.title: 伊朗副朝圣者时隔8年，将于12月19日起登上飞往沙特的航班
item.description:
Iranian pilgrims will for the first time in eight years begin regular travel to Saudi Arabia from Dec. 19, Iranian media reported on Wednesday in the latest sign of thawing relations between the two oil-producing rivals in the Gulf.翻译:伊朗媒体周三报道称，伊朗朝圣者将从 12 月 19 日起八年来首次开始定期前往沙特阿拉伯，这是海湾地区两个产油竞争对手之间关系解冻的最新迹象。

Flights will take off from 10 airports around Iran carrying Iranians travelling on the year-round Umrah pilgrimage to the Islamic holy city of Mecca in Saudi Arabia, the semi-official Fars news agency said.翻译:半官方的法尔斯通讯社称，航班将从伊朗各地的 10 个机场起飞，载着伊朗人全年前往沙特阿拉伯的伊斯兰圣城麦加朝圣。

The first dispatch of Iranian Umrah pilgrims will occur from Dec. 19, Fars added.翻译:法尔斯补充说，首批伊朗朝圣者将从 12 月 19 日开始派遣。

China mediated an agreement in March under which Iran and Saudi Arabia resumed full diplomatic relations that were cut in 2016 over Riyadh's execution of a Shi'ite Muslim cleric and the subsequent storming of the Saudi embassy in Tehran.翻译:今年3月，中国斡旋达成一项协议，根据该协议，伊朗和沙特阿拉伯恢复了2016年因利雅得处决一名什叶派穆斯林神职人员以及随后袭击沙特驻德黑兰大使馆而中断的全面外交关系。

Since 2016, Iranian pilgrims have only been able to complete the haj pilgrimage, a religious duty deemed compulsory for Muslims who aim to carry it out once in their lifetime and which is subject to strict annual quotas and timings.翻译:自2016年以来，伊朗朝圣者只能完成朝觐，这是穆斯林的一项宗教义务，他们的目标是一生一次，并且受到严格的年度配额和时间限制。

Iranians are now able to complete the Umrah as well, known as the "lesser pilgrimage" that can be taken at any time of the year and which is not generally deemed compulsory in Islam.翻译:伊朗人现在也可以完成乌姆拉（Umrah），这种朝圣被称为“小朝圣”，可以在一年中的任何时间进行，并且在伊斯兰教中通常不被认为是强制性的。

Negotiations between Iran and Saudi Arabia also aim to re-establish non-religious tourism between the two countries, with flights linking their capitals.翻译:伊朗和沙特阿拉伯之间的谈判还旨在重建两国之间的非宗教旅游业，并开通往返两国首都的航班。

Fars said up to 70,000 Iranian pilgrims were expected to travel to Saudi Arabia by the end of February 2024.翻译:法尔斯表示，预计到 2024 年 2 月底将有多达 7 万名伊朗朝圣者前往沙特阿拉伯。

Reporting by Dubai Newsroom; editing by Mark Heinrich翻译:迪拜新闻室的报道；马克·海因里希编辑

item.title: 碧桂园已全额汇出偿还人民币债券资金
item.description:
Embattled Chinese developer Country Garden Holdings (2007.HK) has remitted more than 800 million yuan ($111.42 million) to repay onshore bondholders, a company filing to the Shenzhen Stock Exchange late on Tuesday showed.翻译:周二晚间向深圳证券交易所提交的一份公司文件显示，陷入困境的中国开发商碧桂园控股(2007.HK)已汇出超过8亿元人民币（1.1142亿美元）来偿还境内债券持有人。

Bondholders of a total of 8 million notes, each with a principal of 100 yuan chose to exercise the put option by Nov. 28, while Country Garden has wired funds that fully repaid the principal and interest, the filing showed.翻译:文件显示，共有800万张票据（每张本金为100元）的债券持有人选择在11月28日之前行使看跌期权，而碧桂园已电汇资金全额偿还本金和利息。

The repayment comes as Country Garden has defaulted on its $11 billion offshore bonds and is working on a plan to restructure the debt.翻译:此次偿还之际，碧桂园已对其 110 亿美元的海外债券违约，并正在制定债务重组计划。

The company in September won approval from creditors to extend the maturities of eight onshore bonds worth 10.8 billion yuan by three years.翻译:该公司9月获得债权人批准，将8只境内债券的期限延长三年，总价值108亿元人民币。

($1 = 7.1799 Chinese yuan renminbi)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.1799 人民币）

item.title: 审计公司与二人在大众中国工厂的工作保持距离
item.description:
The auditor hired by Volkswagen (VOWG_p.DE) to audit its jointly-owned site in Xinjiang posted a statement on LinkedIn flagging that just two employees supervised the project, in a sign of the reputational challenges posed by undertaking such work in the region.翻译:大众汽车(VOWG_p.DE)聘请审计其在新疆的合资工厂的审计员在 LinkedIn 上发布了一份声明，指出只有两名员工监督该项目，这表明在该地区开展此类工作会带来声誉挑战。

Volkswagen commissioned Loening GmbH to audit its jointly-owned site in Xinjiang, a region of China where rights groups have documented abuses including mass forced labour in detention camps. Beijing denies any such abuses.翻译:大众汽车委托 Loening GmbH 对其在新疆的合资工厂进行审计。新疆是中国的一个地区，人权组织记录了那里的虐待行为，包括拘留营中的大规模强迫劳动。北京否认有任何此类侵权行为。

The statement, posted on Loening's LinkedIn page on Dec. 8, said that the technical audit was carried out by two Chinese lawyers, and supervised by the company's founder and managing director Markus Loening and one further employee. Apart from them, "no other team member participated in, supported or backed this project."翻译:该声明于 12 月 8 日发布在 Loening 的 LinkedIn 页面上，称技术审核由两名中国律师进行，并由公司创始人兼董事总经理 Markus Loening 和另一名员工监督。除了他们之外，“没有其他团队成员参与、支持或支持这个项目。”

"Our team has diligently worked to establish ourselves as reputable knowledgeable experts in business and human rights. We remain committed to being guided by international human rights standards in our work," it said.翻译:“我们的团队努力将自己打造成商业和人权领域声誉卓著、知识渊博的专家。我们仍然致力于在工作中遵循国际人权标准，”声明称。

The statement adds to cautious comments by some Volkswagen investors last week who welcomed the audit but said it could not be a one-off and should be the first of a series of steps to improve transparency in the carmaker's supply chain in China.翻译:该声明进一步强化了大众汽车一些投资者上周的谨慎评论，他们对此次审计表示欢迎，但表示这不可能是一次性的，而应该是提高汽车制造商在中国供应链透明度的一系列措施中的第一步。

Loening said last week it had found no signs of forced labour.翻译:洛宁上周表示， 没有发现强迫劳动的迹象。

Still, managing director Loening noted that the audit had been limited to the site, a joint venture with SAIC Motor (600104.SS), adding the situation in Xinjiang and the challenges in collecting data for audits were well known.翻译:尽管如此，董事总经理 Loening 指出，审计仅限于与上汽集团（600104.SS）的合资企业，并补充说新疆的情况以及收集审计数据的挑战是众所周知的。

Six senior employees reshared the company's statement on their LinkedIn. Four added an extra line to state that they personally did not support accepting the project and were not involved in carrying it out.翻译:六名高级员工在其 LinkedIn 上转发了该公司的声明。其中四人额外添加了一行，表示他们个人不支持接受该项目，也没有参与该项目的实施。

Volkswagen declined to comment. Markus Loening, Loening GmbH and the employees did not immediately respond to a request for comment.翻译:大众汽车拒绝置评。马库斯·洛宁 (Markus Loening)、洛宁有限公司 (Loening GmbH) 及其员工没有立即回复置评请求。

Reporting by Victoria Waldersee, Editing by Rachel More, Alexandra Hudson翻译:维多利亚·瓦尔德西 (Victoria Waldersee) 报道，雷切尔·莫尔 (Rachel More) 编辑，亚历山德拉·哈德森 (Alexandra Hudson)

item.title: 中越关系升级；同意加强安全工作
item.description:
Summary:
  • Hanoi, Beijing agree on building 'shared future'
  • Xi's visit is his first this year to an Asian nation
  • Deals reached on rail, telecoms, but not rare earths
  • Both commit to closer security, intelligence ties
翻译:概括：
  • 河内与北京同意构建“共同未来”
  • 习近平今年首次访问亚洲国家
  • 铁路、电信交易达成，但稀土交易未达成
  • 双方都致力于加强安全和情报联系

China and Vietnam agreed to step up co-operation on security matters in their move towards becoming a community with a "shared future", they said on Wednesday, as Chinese President Xi Jinping wrapped up a visit to Hanoi.翻译:周三，中国国家主席习近平结束对河内的访问，中国和越南表示同意加强安全事务合作，打造“命运共同体”。

On Xi's two-day trip, the Communist-ruled neighbours, close in economic areas but at odds over boundaries in the South China Sea, signed dozens of co-operation pacts and agreed to set up more hotlines to defuse any emergencies in the contested waters.翻译:在习近平为期两天的访问中，共产党统治的邻国在经济领域关系密切，但在南海边界问题上存在分歧，签署了数十项合作协议，并同意设立更多热线，以化解有争议水域的任何紧急情况。 。

In a 16-page joint statement, the countries, which share a millennia-long history of conflict, vowed to work more closely to strengthen defence industry ties and intelligence exchanges.翻译:在一份长达16页的联合声明中，这两个有着千年冲突历史的国家誓言要更加密切地合作，加强国防工业联系和情报交流。

They said their aim was partly to avert the risk of what they called a "colour revolution" promoted by hostile forces, using a term for popular uprisings that have shaken former Communist nations.翻译:他们表示，他们的目的部分是为了避免敌对势力推动的所谓“颜色革命”的风险，“颜色革命”一词指的是震动了前共产主义国家的民众起义。

They "announced the establishment of a strategic China-Vietnam community of 'shared future' to promote the upgrading of China-Vietnam relations," Xi told the chairman of Vietnam's parliament, Vuong Dinh Hue, at a meeting earlier.翻译:习近平在早些时候的一次会议上对越南国会主席王廷惠表示，他们“宣布建立中越战略‘命运共同体’，推动中越关系提质升级”。

The decision was a historic milestone, and joining such a community was a "strategic" choice, Prime Minister Pham Minh Chinh said when he met Xi, who was making his first visit this year to an Asian nation.翻译:越南总理范明正在会见今年首次访问亚洲国家的习近平时表示，这一决定是一个历史性的里程碑，加入这样一个共同体是一个“战略”选择。

The warm comments followed months of talks on how best to describe ties. In Chinese, the "shared future" phrasing uses a word meaning "destiny", but is translated in Vietnamese and English as the more prosaic "future".翻译:在就如何最好地描述两国关系进行了数月的讨论之后，这些热情的评论出现了。在中文中，“共同的未来”措辞使用了一个意思是“命运”的词，但在越南语和英语中被翻译为更平淡无奇的“未来”。

Xi has pushed hard for the upgrade in ties, especially after Vietnam elevated the United States in September to the highest tier of its diplomatic ranking, the same as China's.翻译:习近平大力推动两国关系升级，特别是在越南9月份将美国提升至与中国相同的最高外交级别之后。

As China and the United States vie for influence in the strategic nation, the pacts mark an achievement for Vietnam's "Bamboo" diplomacy, although analysts and diplomats said the improvement in relations could be more symbolic than real.翻译:随着中国和美国争夺在这个战略国家的影响力，这些协议标志着越南“竹”外交的一项成就，尽管分析人士和外交官表示，关系的改善可能更具象征意义，而不是实际意义。

Xi's visit to Vietnam, which is home to a growing number of Chinese manufacturers, is only his fourth overseas this year after trips to Russia, South Africa and the United States.

FOCUS ON DATA, RARE EARTHS

The pacts signed cover possible investments in rail links and security, as well as three on telecoms and "digital data co-operation", a list from Vietnamese authorities showed.翻译:越南当局的一份清单显示，签署的协议涵盖了铁路连接和安全方面可能的投资，以及三项有关电信和“数字数据合作”的投资。

Details of the deals have not been revealed, but experts and diplomats said digital economy pacts could pave the way for Chinese support to build a 5G network in Vietnam and investments in undersea infrastructure.翻译:交易细节尚未透露，但专家和外交官表示，数字经济协议可能为中国支持越南建设 5G 网络和投资海底基础设施铺平道路。

The deals reflect the interests of both sides, said Hung Nguyen, a specialist in supply chain issues at RMIT University Vietnam, as China has recently built an undersea data centre off its southern island of Hainan, while Vietnam wants to develop its infrastructure.翻译:皇家墨尔本理工大学越南分校供应链问题专家 Hung Nguyen 表示，这些交易反映了双方的利益，因为中国最近在南部海南岛建立了一个海底数据中心，而越南则希望发展其基础设施。

Key targets for investment could be areas such as telecoms infrastructure, satellite ground tracking stations and data centres, he added.翻译:他补充说，投资的主要目标可能是电信基础设施、卫星地面跟踪站和数据中心等领域。

But some significant items were missing from the lengthy list of deals.翻译:但冗长的交易清单中缺少一些重要项目。

No pact was unveiled on rare earths, for example, although Xi, in an article in a Vietnamese state newspaper, urged broader co-operation on critical minerals. In the joint statement both agreed to seek ways to co-operate on key minerals, however.翻译:例如，尽管习近平在越南官方报纸上发表文章，敦促在关键矿产方面开展更广泛的合作，但在稀土方面并未公布任何协议。不过，在联合声明中，双方同意寻求在关键矿产方面开展合作的方式。

Vietnam is estimated to have the world's second largest deposits of rare earths after China, with its biggest mines located in an area where the rail network is set to benefit from this week's deals.翻译:据估计，越南拥有仅次于中国的世界第二大稀土矿藏，其最大的矿山位于铁路网络将从本周交易中受益的地区。

China dominates the supply of the minerals crucial for electric vehicles and wind turbines, and is usually loath to share its technology.翻译:中国在电动汽车和风力涡轮机至关重要的矿物供应中占据主导地位，但通常不愿分享其技术。

Vietnam has strict rules on the export of rare earth ores, which it wants to process at home, but often lacks the technology to do so.翻译:越南对稀土矿石的出口有严格的规定，它希望在国内加工稀土矿石，但往往缺乏这样做的技术。

To boost trade and investment, both agreed to set up a zone focusing on farming, infrastructure, energy, digital economy and green development, the statement said.翻译:声明称，为促进贸易和投资，双方同意建立一个以农业、基础设施、能源、数字经济和绿色发展为重点的合作区。

Plans for special economic zones to boost investment had to be shelved after they sparked protests in 2018 by Vietnamese who feared the move could favour Chinese firms.翻译:设立经济特区以促进投资的计划在 2018 年引发了越南人的抗议后不得不被搁置，越南人担心此举可能有利于中国企业。

Reporting by Francesco Guarascio, Phuong Nguyen, Khanh Vu and Minh Nguyen in Hanoi, and Beijing newsroom; Editing by Clarence Fernandez翻译:Francesco Guarascio、Phuong Nguyen、Khanh Vu 和 Minh Nguyen 在河内和北京新闻编辑室的报道；克拉伦斯·费尔南德斯编辑

item.title: 中国11月银行贷款增幅低于预期，宽松预期进一步加强
item.description:
New bank lending in China jumped less than expected in November, even as the central bank keeps policy accommodative to support a feeble recovery in the world's second-largest economy.翻译:尽管央行保持宽松政策以支持世界第二大经济体微弱的复苏，但中国11月份新增银行贷款增幅低于预期。

The People's Bank of China (PBOC) is expected to deliver more modest policy easing in the coming weeks, following a pledge this week by top leaders to step up policy adjustments to support the economic recovery in 2024, analysts said.翻译:分析师表示，继高层领导人本周承诺加大政策调整力度以支持 2024 年经济复苏后，预计中国人民银行 (PBOC) 将在未来几周内实施更加温和的政策宽松。

Chinese banks extended 1.09 trillion yuan ($151.73 billion) in new yuan loans in November, up from October's 738.4 billion yuan but missing analysts' expectations, according to data released by PBOC on Wednesday.翻译:中国央行周三公布的数据显示，11 月份中国各银行新增人民币贷款 1.09 万亿元（合 1,517.3 亿美元），高于 10 月份的 7,384 亿元人民币，但未达到分析师预期。

Last November, banks issued 1.21 trillion yuan in new loans.翻译:去年11月，银行新增贷款1.21万亿元。

Analysts polled by Reuters had predicted new loans would rise to 1.3 billion yuan in November, amid expectations of front-loading by lenders.翻译:路透社调查的分析师此前预测，由于贷款机构会提前放贷，11 月份新增贷款将增至 13 亿元人民币。

"Broad credit growth continued to rise in November thanks to a pick-up in government bond issuance, but it still came in below expectations," Capital Economics said in a note.翻译:凯投宏观在一份报告中表示，“由于政府债券发行量的增加，11月份信贷总体增长继续上升，但仍低于预期。”

"We think further policy support is on the way, but this is unlikely to drive a substantial acceleration in credit growth."翻译:“我们认为进一步的政策支持正在进行中，但这不太可能推动信贷增长大幅加速。”

The PBOC has told several banks to bring forward some of the loans they plan to extend in early 2024 to late this year and to not overdo lending in the first quarter, sources said last month.翻译:消息人士上月称，中国央行已通知多家银行将计划于 2024 年初发放的部分贷款提前至今年年底，并且第一季度不要过度放贷。

Household loans, including mortgages, grew by 292.5 billion yuan in November, after contracting by 34.6 billion yuan in October. Weak consumer confidence, fuelled in part by a deepening property crisis and high unemployment, have weighed heavily on the economy this year.翻译:包括抵押贷款在内的家庭贷款在10月份收缩346亿元后，11月份增加2925亿元。不断加深的房地产危机和高失业率在一定程度上加剧了消费者信心疲软，给今年的经济带来了沉重压力。

Corporate loans rose to 822.1 billion yuan from 516.3 billion yuan in October.翻译:企业贷款从10月份的5163亿元增至8221亿元。

"There is still some room for cutting the reserve requirement ratio and interest rates to help maintain stable liquidity in the banking system and promote reductions in financing costs," Wen Bin, chief economist at Minsheng Bank, said in a note.

POLICY PLEDGE

Central bank chief Pan Gongsheng has pledged to keep monetary policy accommodative to support the post-pandemic recovery, but also urged structural reforms to reduce reliance on infrastructure and property for growth.翻译:央行行长潘功胜承诺保持宽松的货币政策以支持疫情后的复苏，但也敦促进行结构性改革，以减少增长对基础设施和房地产的依赖。

The Politburo, a top decision-making body of the ruling Communist Party, said on Friday that fiscal policy would be moderately strengthened and will be "flexible, moderate, precise, and effective" to help spur the economic recovery.翻译:执政的共产党最高决策机构政治局周五表示，财政政策将适度加强，将“灵活适度、精准有效”，帮助刺激经济复苏。

As part of support measures, the PBOC has cut interest rates on some loans and pumped out more cash in recent months, in contrast to other major economies which have tightened policy to tackle inflation.翻译:作为支持措施的一部分，中国人民银行近几个月降低了部分贷款的利率并注入了更多现金，这与其他主要经济体收紧政策以应对通胀形成鲜明对比。

In September, the PBOC cut banks' reserve requirement ratio for the second time this year, and analysts expect another cut in the coming weeks.翻译:9月，中国人民银行今年第二次下调银行存款准备金率，分析师预计未来几周将再次下调。

Broad M2 money supply rose 10.0% from a year earlier, central bank data showed, missing analyst forecasts for 10.1% growth in the Reuters poll, and compared with 10.3% in October.翻译:央行数据显示，广义M2货币供应量同比增长10.0%，低于路透调查中分析师预测的增长10.1%，而10月份为10.3%。

Outstanding yuan loans grew 10.8% in November from a year earlier compared with 10.9% growth in October. Analysts had expected an 11% increase.翻译:11月份人民币贷款余额同比增长10.8%，而10月份增幅为10.9%。分析师此前预计增长 11%。

Annual growth of outstanding total social financing (TSF), a broad measure of credit and liquidity in the economy, quickened to 9.4% in November from 9.3% in October.翻译:社会融资总额（TSF）是经济中信贷和流动性的广泛衡量标准，其年增长率从 10 月的 9.3% 加快至 11 月的 9.4%。

TSF includes off-balance sheet forms of financing that exist outside the conventional bank lending system, such as initial public offerings, loans from trust companies and bond sales.翻译:TSF包括传统银行贷款体系之外的表外融资形式，例如首次公开募股、信托公司贷款和债券销售。

In November, TSF fell to 2.45 trillion yuan from 1.85 trillion yuan in October. Analysts polled by Reuters had expected November TSF of 2.6 trillion yuan.翻译:11月社会融资规模由10月的1.85万亿元降至2.45万亿元。路透社调查的分析师此前预计 11 月份社会融资规模为 2.6 万亿元人民币。

Reporting by Joe Cash and Kevin Yao; editing by Christina Fincher翻译:乔·卡什和凯文·姚报道；克里斯蒂娜·芬奇编辑

item.title: 第二波寒潮将北京冰雪覆盖
item.description:
Summary:
  • Blizzard and heavy snow forecast in Beijing Wed to Thu
  • China issues first freezing alert since 2013
  • Cumulative snowfall in some areas by Fri could be highest in 10 yrs
翻译:概括：
  • 周三至周四，北京预计有暴雪和大雪
  • 中国发布2013年以来首次冰冻警报
  • 周五部分地区累计降雪量可能创10年来最高

Snow, blizzards and plunging temperatures swept northern China in what could be one of its most severe cold snaps in December, spurring authorities in the capital to halt train services, shut schools and tell people to stay home.翻译:降雪、暴风雪和骤降的气温席卷了中国北方，这可能是12月份最严重的寒潮之一，促使首都当局停止火车服务、关闭学校并要求人们呆在家里。

A mass of cold air drifted into Beijing from the west, the second cold wave this week. City officials have issued the second-highest alert for blizzards through Thursday, the only such warning yet in the country.翻译:一股冷空气从西部飘入北京，这是本周第二波寒流。市政府官员周四发布了第二高的暴风雪警报，这是该国迄今为止唯一的此类警报。

To avert chaos threatened by what was expected to be a "long-lasting" round of snowfall, the city of nearly 22 million shut all schools from Wednesday and moved classes online. Businesses were told to offer employees flexible working conditions and staggered commutes.翻译:为了避免预计将出现的“长期”降雪带来的混乱，这座拥有近 2200 万人口的城市从周三起关闭了所有学校，并将课程转移到网上。企业被告知要为员工提供灵活的工作条件和错峰通勤。

"We'll try not to travel," said a 36-year-old Beijing resident surnamed Liu, whose child's school had closed as snow fell for the second time since Monday.翻译:“我们会尽量不去旅行，”一名 36 岁的刘姓北京居民说，他孩子的学校因周一以来第二次降雪而停课。

"It's cold, and the roads are definitely bad."翻译:“天气很冷，而且路况肯定很差。”

Scenic spots in the mountainous north and west have been temporarily shut.翻译:北部和西部山区的景区已暂时关闭。

Some railway services with key cities, such as the commercial hub of Shanghai, Hangzhou and Wuhan, were suspended. Trains that still ran went at slower speed, causing delays. But Beijing's Capital Airport continued to operate.翻译:部分与上海、杭州、武汉等商业中心城市的铁路服务暂停。仍在运行的火车速度较慢，导致延误。但北京首都机场继续运营。

Beijing could face temperatures as low as minus 18 degrees Celsius (minus 0.4 degrees Fahrenheit) this weekend, compared to the mid-December average of about minus 8 C (17.6 F).翻译:本周末北京的气温可能低至-18摄氏度（-0.4华氏度），而12月中旬的平均气温约为-8摄氏度（17.6华氏度）。

Even Shanghai in the south, now experiencing balmy weather of 20 degrees Celsius (68 F), is forecast to be buffeted by weather as frigid as minus 4 C (24.8 F) on Saturday and Sunday.翻译:即使是南方的上海，现在正经历着 20 摄氏度（68 华氏度）的宜人天气，预计周六和周日也将遭遇零下 4 摄氏度（24.8 华氏度）的寒冷天气。

More than 6,000 rescuers have been put on call for road emergency rescues and more than 5,800 sets of snow-removal equipment and machinery are on standby.翻译:目前，已有6000余名救援人员待命进行道路应急救援，5800余台套除雪设备机械待命。

About 32,000 metric tons of snow-thawing agent has been readied for use on icy roads and motorways.翻译:约 32,000 吨融雪剂已准备好用于结冰的道路和高速公路。

City officials canvassed volunteers to clear snow and shovel ice, in addition to 73,000 people on duty to tackle these tasks, and ordered indoor heating stepped up.翻译:市政府官员召集了73,000名值班人员来清除积雪和铲冰，并下令加强室内供暖。

Beijing last experienced such cold weather on Jan. 7, 2021, when the temperature fell to minus 19.6 C (minus 3.28 F). The city's all-time low of minus 27.4 C (minus 17.32 F), was recorded on Feb. 22, 1966.翻译:北京上次经历如此寒冷的天气是在2021年1月7日，当时气温降至-19.6摄氏度（-3.28华氏度）。该市的历史最低气温记录于 1966 年 2 月 22 日，为负 27.4 摄氏度（负 17.32 华氏度）。

This week's cold snap, compared with the autumn-like conditions of a week ago, reflects recent sharp temperature swings. October was one of Beijing's warmest in decades, in a year of weather extremes.翻译:与一周前的秋季气候相比，本周的寒流反映出近期气温的急剧波动。十月是北京几十年来最热的一年，也是极端天气的一年。

While northern China grappled with chillier-than-normal conditions, Hangzhou will officially begin winter only on Dec. 16, two weeks behind schedule and the latest since records began in 1951.翻译:虽然中国北方正在努力应对比正常情况更寒冷的天气，但杭州将于 12 月 16 日正式进入冬季，比原计划晚了两周，也是自 1951 年有记录以来最晚的一次。

The city, near Shanghai, had to record five straight days of sub-10 C temperatures to declare the arrival of winter.

FROZEN RIVERS

Temperatures could drop more than 14 C, across swathes of northern, northwestern and southern China, along with parts of Inner Mongolia, Guizhou province and even regions south of the Yangtze River, weather officials have said.翻译:气象官员表示，中国北部、西北和南部大片地区，以及内蒙古、贵州省部分地区，甚至长江以南地区，气温可能下降超过14摄氏度。

Issuing its first alert since 2013 against freezing temperatures, the National Meteorological Centre (NMC) urged local governments to take precautions, along with measures to protect tropical crops and aquatic produce.翻译:国家气象中心（NMC）发布了自2013年以来的首次冰冻警报，敦促地方政府采取预防措施，并采取措施保护热带作物和水产品。

It has forecast wide rain and snowfall in central and eastern regions until Friday, with as much as 30 mm (1.2 inches) of precipitation in snowstorms in parts of Shaanxi, Henan and Shandong provinces.翻译:预计到周五，中部和东部地区将出现大范围降雨和降雪，陕西、河南和山东省部分地区的暴风雪降水量将高达30毫米（1.2英寸）。

The cumulative snowfall could be the highest in the corresponding period in a decade, it added.翻译:报告补充说，累计降雪量可能是十年来同期最高的。

Many rivers have already frozen over in the vast northeastern province of Heilongjiang bordering Russia.翻译:在与俄罗斯接壤的东北部广大省份黑龙江，许多河流已经结冰。

Since Dec. 10, daily precipitation has exceeded December "extremes" at nearly 130 weather stations in provinces such as Shanxi, Henan, Shaanxi and Hebei, the NMC said.翻译:国家气象局表示，自12月10日以来，山西、河南、陕西、河北等省份近130个气象站日降水量均超过12月“极值”。

Reporting by Ryan Woo and Liz Lee; Editing by Sonali Paul and Clarence Fernandez翻译:Ryan Woo 和 Liz Lee 的报道；索纳利·保罗和克拉伦斯·费尔南德斯编辑
item.author: Ryan Woo, Liz Lee

item.title: 伦敦对冲基金 Aspect Capital 探索中国基金业务 - 消息人士
item.description:
London-based quantitative hedge fund Aspect Capital will soon apply to qualify to set up shop in mainland China to establish onshore fundraising and offer its products, two sources familiar with the matter said.翻译:两位知情人士称，总部位于伦敦的量化对冲基金 Aspect Capital 将很快申请在中国大陆设立办事处的资格，以开展境内融资并提供其产品。

The hedge fund, overseeing more than $8 billion in asset, is preparing to open a Shanghai office and hired two senior staff in October, according to a third source and LinkedIn profile updates.翻译:据第三位消息人士和 LinkedIn 个人资料更新显示，这家管理着超过 80 亿美元资产的对冲基金正准备在 10 月份开设上海办事处，并聘请了两名高级员工。

The move by the computer driven fund giant comes at a time when many foreign investors are retreating from the world’s second largest economy due to increasing economic and geopolitical challenges, and shows some global investors still see potential in China's market.翻译:这家计算机驱动的基金巨头此举正值许多外国投资者因日益严峻的经济和地缘政治挑战而从世界第二大经济体撤出之际，这表明一些全球投资者仍然看到了中国市场的潜力。

Aspect aims to be registered as a wholly foreign-owned enterprise (WFOE), which would allow the hedge fund to tap into the increasing demand from China's massive investors for alternative assets. They are still in the early stage of the process, said one of the sources.翻译:Aspect 的目标是注册为外商独资企业（WFOE），这将使该对冲基金能够利用中国大量投资者对另类资产日益增长的需求。一位消息人士称，他们仍处于这一过程的早期阶段。

Aspect Capital declined to comment on its China business plan.翻译:Aspect Capital拒绝就其中国业务计划发表评论。

China has been making efforts to lure foreign investment into its capital market, by improving efficiency, and expanding the range of assets and cross-border hedging tools, despite its tensions with the west.翻译:尽管与西方关系紧张，但中国一直在努力通过提高效率、扩大资产范围和跨境对冲工具来吸引外国投资进入其资本市场。

Citadel Securities, one of the world's biggest market-making firms, last month said the firm is exploring a China licence.翻译:全球最大的做市公司之一 Citadel 证券上个月表示，该公司正在探索获得中国牌照。

Currently there are approximately 115 foreign financial institutions that have set up WFOEs in China, including Blackrock, Blackstone, and KKR, according to Z-Ben Advisors.翻译:据Z-Ben Advisors统计，目前约有115家外资金融机构在中国设立了外商独资企业，其中包括贝莱德、 黑石、KKR等。

In 2021, Aspect launched a China-focused strategy offering foreign clients access to a diverse range of the country's commodity futures and government bond futures via swaps.翻译:2021年，Aspect推出了以中国为中心的战略，为外国客户提供通过掉期交易获得多种中国商品期货和政府债券期货的机会。

“Chinese futures market is incredibly deep, liquid and different,” Razvan Remsing, director of investment solutions at Aspect Capital, told Reuters last week.翻译:Aspect Capital 投资解决方案总监拉兹万·雷辛 (Razvan Remsing) 上周对路透社表示：“中国期货市场的深度、流动性和差异性令人难以置信。”

He said futures on industrial commodities such as PTA, Polyethylene, PVC or fertilizer in the form of soda ash and urea or inputs into construction like glass, have no western equivalent markets. Thus the global pricing on these commodities is set in China.翻译:他表示，PTA、聚乙烯、聚氯乙烯等工业商品的期货或纯碱和尿素形式的化肥或玻璃等建筑投入品的期货，没有西方同等市场。因此，这些商品的全球定价是在中国设定的。

So far this year, trend-following quant funds that typically are machine-driven and trade across equities, bonds, commodities, have done well in China even as its equities market slumped to a five-year low.翻译:今年到目前为止，尽管中国股市跌至五年低点，但通常由机器驱动并进行股票、债券和大宗商品交易的趋势跟踪量化基金在中国表现良好。

Aspect’s competitor, U.S. quant fund Two Sigma Investments, saw its CTA (commodity trading advisers) fund in mainland China jump 10% for the first 10 months, according to an investor letter seen by Reuters. Two Sigma declined to comment.翻译:据路透社看到的一封投资者信函显示，Aspect 的竞争对手、美国量化基金 Two Sigma Investments 在中国大陆的 CTA（商品交易顾问）基金前 10 个月上涨了 10%。两个西格码拒绝置评。

(This story has been corrected to change the pronoun to 'he' in paragraph 11)翻译:（这个故事已被更正，将第11段中的代词改为“他”）

Reporting by Summer Zhen, Nell Mackenzie, additional reporting by Tom Westbrook in Singapore; Editing by Michael Perry翻译:Summer Jen、Nell Mackenzie 的报道，Tom Westbrook 在新加坡的补充报道；迈克尔·佩里编辑
item.author: Summer Zhen, Nell Mackenzie

item.title: 中国风险投资、私募股权基金因拟议的变革而感到不安
item.description:
China's proposal to drastically raise the bar for investing in private equity (PE) and venture capital (VC) funds is facing backlash from industry players concerned it could wipe out small funds and choke financing to startups struggling in a weak economy.翻译:中国大幅提高私募股权（PE）和风险投资（VC）基金投资门槛的提议遭到业内人士的强烈反对，他们担心这可能会消灭小型基金，并阻碍为在经济疲软中苦苦挣扎的初创企业提供融资。

The country's securities regulators published draft rules late on Friday that would require a qualified investor in PE and VC funds to put up at least 3 million yuan ($418,731), tripling the current threshold in an effort to protect small investors.翻译:中国证券监管机构周五晚间发布了规则草案，要求私募股权和风险投资基金的合格投资者投资至少 300 万元人民币（418,731 美元），是目前门槛的三倍，以保护小投资者。

For funds that invest the bulk of their assets in a particular company or project, the bar for individual investors is set at 10 million yuan, up from 1 million previously.翻译:对于将大部分资产投资于特定公司或项目的基金，个人投资者的门槛从之前的100万元提高到1000万元。

"The new, tough rules would dig the grave for small players," said Abraham Zhang, chairman of Shenzhen-based venture capital firm China Europe Capital, which invests in technology like chipmaking and artificial intelligence. "It's aggravating sufferings of an industry already shivering in a bleak winter."翻译:总部位于深圳的风险投资公司中欧资本董事长亚伯拉罕·张表示，“新的、严格的规定将为小企业挖坟墓。”该公司投资于芯片制造和人工智能等技术。 “这加剧了这个已经在寒冬中瑟瑟发抖的行业的痛苦。”

Fundraising by newly set-up PE and VC funds in China slumped 20% during the first nine months of 2023, according to consultancy Zero2IPO, as the country's weak economy and wobbly stock market dampened risk appetite.翻译:清科咨询公司的数据显示，2023 年前 9 个月，中国新设立的 PE 和 VC 基金的融资额下降了 20%，原因是中国经济疲软和股市波动抑制了风险偏好。

Smaller, earlier-stage venture funds tend to rely on high-net worth, individual investors for fundraising, compared with larger, later-stage funds that typically tap institutional money for capital, industry players said.翻译:业内人士表示，规模较小的早期风险基金往往依赖高净值个人投资者进行融资，而规模较大的后期基金通常利用机构资金获取资本。

Li Gangqiang, a veteran venture capitalist and co-founder of Beijing Potential Shares Technology Co, a fundraising platform for early-stage investors and company entrepreneurs, said the proposal was "devastating" to single-project funds that are currently favoured by individual investors.翻译:资深风险投资家、北京势股科技有限公司联合创始人李刚强表示，这一提议对目前受到个人投资者青睐的单一项目基金来说是“毁灭性的”。

"Such a policy is extremely unfair to single-project fund managers ... and to small investors," Li said in a blog post, expecting at least 1,000 private fund management firms to be eliminated if the rules take effect in the current form.翻译:李在一篇博客文章中表示：“这样的政策对单一项目基金管理公司……以及小投资者来说极其不公平。”他预计，如果这些规则以目前的形式生效，至少有 1000 家私募基金管理公司将被淘汰。

The China Securities Regulatory Commission (CSRC), which has repeatedly vowed this year to reduce financial risks, said the rules were designed to protect small investors.翻译:中国证监会今年多次表示要降低金融风险，并表示这些规定旨在保护中小投资者。

But venture capitalists say the new policies could backfire.翻译:但风险投资家表示，新政策可能会适得其反。

"In a tough fundraising environment, it's like spreading salt on your wound, and runs counter to government support toward early-stage, tech startups," said Andrew Qian, CEO of Shanghai-based New Access Capital, which manages more than 1 billion yuan with a focus on growth-stage investing.翻译:“在艰难的融资环境下，这就像在伤口上撒盐，与政府对早期科技初创企业的支持背道而驰，”总部位于上海的新通资本首席执行官安德鲁·钱表示，该公司管理着超过10亿元人民币的资金重点关注成长期投资。

China-focused, yuan-denominated PE funds have raised $9.7 billion so far this year versus $33.7 billion last year and $116.6 billion in 2021, marking the lowest since at least 2010, according to data firm Preqin.翻译:数据公司 Preqin 的数据显示，专注于中国的人民币计价私募股权基金今年迄今已筹集 97 亿美元，而去年为 337 亿美元，2021 年为 1,166 亿美元，创下至少 2010 年以来的最低水平。

In addition, no China-focused buyout fund has been raised in 2023 in any currency. That compares with $210 million in 2022 and $13.2 billion in 2019 before the pandemic.翻译:此外，2023 年尚未筹集任何货币的专注于中国的收购基金。相比之下，疫情爆发前，2022 年为 2.1 亿美元，2019 年为 132 亿美元。

Qian argues that VC funds, especially those that target smaller investors such as family members and friends that are most vulnerable to the new rules should be regulated differently from big private equity funds.翻译:钱认为，风险投资基金，特别是那些针对最容易受到新规则影响的家庭成员和朋友等小型投资者的风险投资基金，应该受到与大型私募股权基金不同的监管。

"Overseas, angel investment is accessible" to ordinary people, the VC veteran said, referring to countries like the U.S. "But we shut the doors to such investors. That would make fundraising even more difficult."翻译:这位风投资深人士表示，“在海外，天使投资对普通人来说是可以接受的”，他指的是美国等国家，“但我们对此类投资者关上了大门。这将使融资变得更加困难。”

($1 = 7.1749 Chinese yuan renminbi)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.1749 人民币）

Reporting by Samuel Shen and Li Gu in Shanghai and Kane Wu in Hong Kong; editing by Jamie Freed翻译:Samuel Shen 和 Li Gu 在上海以及 Kane Wu 在香港的报道；杰米·弗里德编辑
item.author: Samuel Shen, Kane Wu

item.title: 消息人士称，中国军队接近台湾海岸，在关键选举前“恐吓”选民
item.description:
Taiwan's military drove away four attempts by Chinese forces to approach the island's sensitive contiguous zone last month, Taiwan security officials said, in what they see as a ramped-up Chinese campaign to "intimidate" voters before key elections.翻译:台湾安全官员表示，上个月，台湾军方四次击退了中国军队接近该岛敏感毗连区的企图，他们认为这是中国在关键选举前加强“恐吓”选民的行动。

Taiwan officials have repeatedly warned that China is trying to sway voters toward candidates seeking closer ties with Beijing, whose government has framed the Jan. 13 presidential and parliamentary elections as a choice between "peace and war" and urged Taiwanese to make the "right choice".翻译:台湾官员一再警告称，中国正试图引导选民支持寻求与北京建立更密切关系的候选人，中国政府将 1 月 13 日的总统和议会选举视为“和平与战争”之间的选择，并敦促台湾人做出“正确的选择” ”。

Taiwan has complained during the past four years of regular Chinese military incursions as Beijing increases pressure to try to force the democratically governed island to accept its sovereignty.翻译:台湾在过去四年中一直抱怨中国定期进行军事入侵，因为北京加大压力，试图迫使这个民主治理的岛屿接受其主权。

China has stepped up such missions before Taiwan's election as campaigning has kicked into high gear, Taiwan security officials and Taipei-based diplomats say.翻译:台湾安全官员和驻台北外交官表示，随着竞选活动进入高潮，中国在台湾大选前加强了此类任务。

China's air and naval forces staged four coordinated manoeuvres approaching Taiwan's contiguous zone, which is 24 nautical miles (44 km) off its coast, in November, according to multiple Taiwan security officials who discussed the matter with reporters and an internal Taiwanese memo summing up the Chinese activities.翻译:据多位与记者讨论过此事的台湾安全官员以及台湾一份总结此次事件的内部备忘录称，中国空军和海军去年 11 月在距台湾海岸 24 海里（44 公里）的邻近地区进行了四次协调演习。华人活动。

The Chinese military moves were part of a "multi-front campaign of voting interference," the memo wrote, saying that it also included exchange activities with Taiwan politicians and spreading misinformation to sway public opinion.翻译:备忘录写道，中国的军事行动是“多线干预投票行动”的一部分，还包括与台湾政界人士的交流活动以及散布错误信息以影响公众舆论。

The contiguous zone drills were "simulating an intrusion and testing the response of our national military", said one of the officials, who requested anonymity because of the sensitivity of the matter. Taiwan dispatched forces to drive the Chinese forces away, the source added.翻译:一名官员表示，邻近地区演习是“模拟入侵并测试我们国家军队的反应”。由于此事敏感，该官员要求匿名。消息人士补充说，台湾派出军队驱逐中国军队。

China's defence ministry and Taiwan Affairs Office did not respond to requests for comment. When commenting on the elections previously, the Taiwan Affairs Office has said it respects Taiwan's "social systems".翻译:中国国防部和台湾事务办公室没有回应置评请求。国台办此前在评论选举时曾表示尊重台湾的“社会制度”。

Chinese activities in November also included balloons that crossed the Taiwan Strait's sensitive median line for two days in a row, as well as marine research ships approaching close to its contiguous zone off Taiwan's eastern and western shores, the officials said.翻译:官员们称，中国11月份的活动还包括连续两天飞越台湾海峡敏感中线的气球，以及接近台湾东西海岸邻近地区的海洋研究船。

In November, a Chinese commercial tugboat entered Taiwan's southern territorial waters, which are defined as 12 nautical miles from its coast, according to the sources.翻译:消息人士称，11月，一艘中国商业拖船进入台湾南部领海，该水域距离台湾海岸12海里。

"Through these military and non-military forces, they were making a statement that they can do something to Taiwan anytime while keeping the tensions up," the official said. "It is evident psychological warfare. They are spreading the message of 'peace and war' every day."翻译:这位官员表示：“他们通过这些军事和非军事力量发出声明，表示他们可以随时对台湾采取行动，同时保持紧张局势。” “这是明显的心理战。他们每天都在传播‘和平与战争’的信息。”

A second Taiwan official described the Chinese manoeuvres as part of Beijing's escalating campaign of "grey zone" warfare seeking to wear Taiwan down with repeated drills and to "intimidate" voters.翻译:另一位台湾官员称，中国的演习是北京不断升级的“灰色地带”战争活动的一部分，旨在通过反复演习来削弱台湾并“恐吓”选民。

"They want to make it look like their prophecy might come true," the person said, pointing to the narrative that if the ruling Democratic Progressive Party (DPP) stays in power, a war with China is likely.翻译:这位人士表示：“他们想让自己的预言看起来可能成真。”他指出，如果执政的民进党继续掌权，可能会与中国发生战争。

Vice President Lai Ching-te and running mate Hsiao Bi-khim from the DPP are leading in the polls. China views them as separatists and has rebuffed Lai's offers of talks.翻译:民进党副总统赖清德和竞选搭档萧美琴在民调中领先。中国将他们视为分裂分子，并拒绝了赖清德的会谈提议。

In a ratcheting up of tensions about a month before the elections, Taiwan's defence ministry said 12 Chinese fighter jets and a suspected weather balloon last week crossed the median line.翻译:选举前大约一个月，台湾国防部表示，上周有 12 架中国战斗机和一个疑似气象气球越过中线，导致紧张局势加剧。

Taiwan on Monday sent forces to watch a Chinese naval formation, led by the aircraft carrier Shandong, sailing through the Taiwan Strait.翻译:台湾周一派出部队观看由山东号航空母舰率领的中国海军编队穿越台湾海峡。

Taiwan's government is on high alert for what they see as China's attempts to interfere in the elections by illicitly funding Beijing-friendly candidates using communications apps, group tours or misinformation campaigns, internal security reports reviewed by Reuters show.翻译:路透社看到的内部安全报告显示，台湾政府对中国试图通过通讯应用、团体旅游或虚假信息活动非法资助亲北京的候选人来干预选举的行为保持高度警惕。

Beijing has also sponsored cut-price trips to China for hundreds of local Taiwanese politicians ahead of the elections, Reuters has reported, citing sources and documents.翻译:据路透社援引消息人士和文件报道，北京方面还在选举前赞助了数百名台湾当地政界人士前往中国的低价旅行。

Reporting By Yimou Lee; additional reporting by Ben Blanchard; Editing by Gerry Doyle翻译:李艺谋报道；本·布兰查德 (Ben Blanchard) 的补充报道；格里·多伊尔编辑

item.title: 美国委员会提出2024年对抗中国的立法“蓝图”
item.description:
A U.S. congressional committee issued an extensive list of bipartisan recommendations on Tuesday to reset America's economic ties with China, setting out legislative goals for 2024 that it said would prevent the U.S. from becoming the "economic vassal" of its chief geopolitical rival.翻译:美国国会一个委员会周二发布了一份内容广泛的两党建议清单，旨在重启美国与中国的经济关系，并制定了2024年的立法目标，称这些目标将防止美国成为其主要地缘政治对手的“经济附庸”。

The proposals drew on a year of hearings and investigations by the House of Representatives' select committee on China, and range from what would be dramatic shifts in U.S. regulatory approaches, including adding restrictions on outbound investment to China, to more technical legal revisions, such as reducing a threshold for duty-free shipments from China into the U.S.翻译:这些提案借鉴了众议院中国问题特别委员会一年来的听证会和调查，内容包括美国监管方式的巨大转变，包括增加对中国境外投资的限制，以及更具技术性的法律修订，例如降低从中国免税运送到美国的门槛

Implementing the measures would "require hard trade-offs and will not be without cost," the committee, led by Republican chair Mike Gallagher and Democratic ranking member Raja Krishnamoorthi, said in a report.翻译:由共和党主席迈克·加拉格尔和民主党资深成员拉贾·克里希纳莫蒂领导的委员会在一份报告中表示，实施这些措施将“需要艰难的权衡，并且不会没有代价”。

"The United States now has a choice: accept Beijing's vision of America as its economic vassal or stand up for our security, values, and prosperity," the committee said.翻译:该委员会表示：“美国现在有一个选择：要么接受北京将美国视为其经济附庸的愿景，要么捍卫我们的安全、价值观和繁荣。”

Gallagher and Krishnamoorthi told reporters on a call that the November meeting between President Joe Biden and Chinese leader Xi Jinping in San Francisco, intended to smooth rocky relations, did little to change their 150 recommendations.翻译:加拉格尔和克里希纳莫蒂在电话中告诉记者，美国总统乔·拜登和中国国家主席习近平11月在旧金山举行的会晤旨在缓和不稳定的关系，但并没有改变他们提出的150项建议。

Among them: forcing a ban or Chinese divestment of social media platform TikTok, directing the Commerce Department to impose import duties on legacy Chinese semiconductors, requiring the Federal Reserve to stress-test U.S. banks' ability to withstand a potential loss of market access to China, and restricting U.S. federal agencies from buying Chinese-made drones.翻译:其中：强制禁止中国社交媒体平台TikTok或撤资、指示商务部对中国传统半导体征收进口关税、要求美联储对美国银行承受可能失去中国市场准入的能力进行压力测试，并限制美国联邦机构购买中国制造的无人机。

"I think this is really a blueprint for some bipartisan legislation that we're hoping to move in the next year," Krishnamoorthi said.翻译:克里希纳莫蒂说：“我认为这确实是一些两党立法的蓝图，我们希望明年能够推动这些立法。”

The committee was set up earlier this year in an effort to convince Americans why they should care about competing with China, and has promoted the selective decoupling of the U.S. and Chinese economies.翻译:该委员会于今年早些时候成立，旨在说服美国人为什么应该关心与中国的竞争，并推动了美国和中国经济的选择性脱钩。

Gallagher said Republicans were having a "robust discussion" on how to move forward with legislation restricting U.S. outbound investment to China, a version of which was dropped from an annual defense authorization bill. He added that he was hopeful those discussions would lead to "responsible legislative activity" in the first quarter of 2024.翻译:加拉格尔表示，共和党人正在就如何推进限制美国对华对外投资的立法进行“热烈讨论”，该法案的一个版本已从年度国防授权法案中删除。他补充说，他希望这些讨论能够在 2024 年第一季度带来“负责任的立法活动”。

"Even those major asset managers or bankers with whom we've engaged that are skeptical of any restrictions on investment in China, even in military and critical technological areas, I think would welcome the predictability that legislating the issue would provide," Gallagher said.翻译:加拉格尔表示：“即使是那些与我们接触过的主要资产管理公司或银行家，他们对对中国的投资限制持怀疑态度，即使是在军事和关键技术领域，但我认为，他们也会欢迎立法这一问题所提供的可预测性。”

Reporting by Michael Martina; Editing by Alex Richardson翻译:迈克尔·玛蒂娜报道；亚历克斯·理查森编辑
item.author: Michael Martina

item.title: 美国与北京就安排军事沟通事宜进行接触-五角大楼
item.description:
The United States has been coordinating with Beijing to arrange military-to-military talks, the Pentagon said on Tuesday, though it did not have any announcements on any talks.翻译:五角大楼周二表示，美国一直在与北京协调安排军事会谈，但没有就任何会谈发表任何声明。

U.S. President Joe Biden and Chinese leader Xi Jinping agreed last month at a closely watched California summit to resume such contacts, which were severed after then-House of Representatives Speaker Nancy Pelosi visited self-ruled Taiwan in August 2022. China claims sovereignty over democratically governed Taiwan.翻译:美国总统乔·拜登和中国国家主席习近平上个月在一场备受关注的加州峰会上同意恢复这种接触，这种接触在时任众议院议长南希·佩洛西于 2022 年 8 月访问自治的台湾后被中断。中国声称对民主治理的台湾拥有主权台湾。

"We have been working closely with our defense attache office and our policy team has been in active coordination with Beijing in order to arrange communication," Pentagon spokesperson Major General Patrick Ryder told a press conference.翻译:五角大楼发言人帕特里克·莱德少将在新闻发布会上表示：“我们一直在与我们的武官办公室密切合作，我们的政策团队一直在与北京积极协调，以安排沟通。”

"But again nothing to announce at this time," he added, in terms of any specific engagements.翻译:“但目前没有什么可宣布的，”他补充说，就任何具体合作而言。

White House national security adviser Jake Sullivan said at a Wall Street Journal event on Tuesday that he believed progress on military-to-military communication was on track since the Biden-Xi summit only took place a few weeks ago.翻译:白宫国家安全顾问杰克·沙利文周二在《华尔街日报》的一次活动中表示，他相信自从几周前才举行拜登与习近平峰会以来，军方沟通方面的进展正在步入正轨。

"I actually don't think of it as a delay. I think this is just the normal implementation of a summit outcome and it's continuing as both sides expected it would so I see no issue there," Sullivan said.翻译:沙利文说：“我实际上并不认为这是一种拖延。我认为这只是峰会成果的正常实施，并且按照双方的预期继续进行，所以我认为这没有问题。”

"We believe that the real question is not: 'Will it get started? We're confident in that. The real question is: Can it be sustained through any ups and downs that may come in the future," Sullivan added.翻译:“我们认为真正的问题不是：‘它会开始吗？我们对此充满信心。真正的问题是：它能否在未来可能出现的任何起起落落中持续下去，’”沙利文补充道。

The Biden administration has said that it wants communications throughout the two countries' militaries, including both senior leaders and commanders in specific geographic areas.翻译:拜登政府表示，希望两国军队能够进行沟通，包括特定地理区域的高级领导人和指挥官。

Relations between the two countries grew frosty after Biden ordered the shooting down in February of a suspected Chinese spy balloon that flew over the United States.翻译:拜登二月份下令击落飞越美国上空的疑似中国间谍气球后，两国关系变得冷淡。

But top Biden administration officials have since visited Beijing and met with their counterparts to rebuild communications and trust.翻译:但拜登政府高级官员此后访问了北京，并与同行会面，以重建沟通和信任。

Reporting by Idrees Ali and Phil Stewart; Additional reporting by Andrea Shalal and Doina Chiacu; editing by Jonathan Oatis and Sandra Maler翻译:Idrees Ali 和 Phil Stewart 报道； Andrea Shalal 和 Doina Chiacu 的补充报道；乔纳森·奥蒂斯和桑德拉·马勒编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 北京智库称儿童是中国最好的投资
item.description:
Children are the most worthy investment for China's economy to help stimulate consumption and expand domestic demand a Beijing policy institute said, after the country posted its first population drop in more than six decades last year.翻译:北京政策研究所表示，在中国去年出现六十多年来人口首次下降后，儿童是中国经济最有价值的投资，有助于刺激消费和扩大内需。

China, the world's second-largest economy, has struggled to mount a strong post-pandemic recovery and any decline in its future workforce and consumer demand could have a profound impact on its economy.翻译:作为世界第二大经济体，中国一直在努力实现疫情后的强劲复苏，未来劳动力和消费者需求的任何下降都可能对其经济产生深远影响。

"In the current Chinese economy, children are the best investment. Infrastructure investment is becoming saturated, manufacturing has overcapacity ... but investment in the number of children is not enough," said the policy paper by the Yuwa Population Research institute published on Tuesday.翻译:友和人口研究所周二发布的政策文件称，“当前中国经济中，孩子是最好的投资。基础设施投资趋于饱和，制造业产能过剩……但对孩子数量的投资还不够。” 。

The paper urged authorities to "urgently" reverse a rapid decline in the number of newborns.翻译:该报敦促当局“紧急”扭转新生儿数量迅速下降的趋势。

China's advantage will shrink in the future as the young population shrinks rapidly, while economic measures such as cutting interest rates, activating the capital market and optimising real estate regulation have not helped to bolster economic growth and the recovery remains weak, it said.翻译:报告称，未来中国的优势将缩小，因为年轻人口迅速萎缩，而降息、激活资本市场、优化房地产调控等经济措施对提振经济增长无助益，复苏依然疲软。

In order to boost the economy, the Yuwa report recommended that maternity subsidies be distributed at a national level rather than by local governments and targeted measures be implemented to reduce the large cost of childbearing and rearing.翻译:为了提振经济，友和报告建议生育补贴应由国家层面而不是地方政府来分配，并采取有针对性的措施，降低生育和抚养的巨额成本。

Local governments have announced a series of measures to help lower childcare costs in recent years but many policies翻译:近年来，地方政府出台了一系列降低托儿费用的措施，但不少政策

have not been implemented or remain on paper due to insufficient funding and lack of motivation by local governments, it said翻译:报告称，由于资金不足和地方政府缺乏动力，尚未落实或停留在纸面上。

"Nowadays people are unwilling to get married and have children ... Because the cost of childbearing is too high, the difficulty for women to balance family and work, the average fertility willingness of Chinese people is almost the lowest in the world."翻译:“现在人们不愿意结婚生子……因为生育成本太高，女性难以平衡家庭和工作，中国人的平均生育意愿几乎是全世界最低的。”

Current subsidies are still insufficient, lower than most European countries it said.翻译:目前的补贴仍然不足，低于大多数欧洲国家的水平。

China reported a drop of roughly 850,000 people for a population of 1.41175 billion in 2022, marking the first decline since 1961, the last year of China's Great Famine.翻译:中国报告称，2022年人口将达到14.1175亿，减少约85万人，这是自1961年（中国大饥荒的最后一年）以来的首次下降。

Reporting by Farah Master and the Biejing newsroom; Editing by Michael Perry翻译:Farah Master和北京新闻编辑室报道；迈克尔·佩里编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 2024年中国落后市场的投资者将采取防御策略
item.description:
Investors in Chinese stocks next year will be seeking out businesses with global reach or other insulation from an economic downturn, after three straight years of China underperforming world markets.翻译:在中国连续三年落后于世界市场之后，明年中国股票的投资者将寻找具有全球影响力或其他免受经济衰退影响的企业。

Companies in defensive sectors such as health, medical innovation and exporters in the electric vehicles supply chain and advanced manufacturing, as well as multinationals such as e-commerce firm PDD Holdings (PDD.O), will top the list.翻译:健康、医疗创新等防御性行业的公司以及电动汽车供应链和先进制造业的出口商，以及电子商务公司 PDD Holdings (PDD.O)等跨国公司将名列榜首。

That's despite sell-side analysts turning bullish on China's broader market for next year, with Morgan Stanley and Goldman Sachs forecasting Chinese equities to outperform the S&P 500.翻译:尽管卖方分析师转而看好明年中国更广泛的市场，摩根士丹利和高盛预测中国股市将跑赢标准普尔 500 指数。

"Since economic recovery is slower than expected, we lowered exposures which are sensitive to macro cycles," said Wang Qing, chairman at Shanghai Chongyang Investment Management.翻译:上海重阳投资管理有限公司董事长王庆表示，“由于经济复苏慢于预期，我们降低了对宏观周期敏感的风险敞口。”

Chongyang is instead buying defensive high-dividend stocks, medical innovators with global competitiveness, and advanced manufacturing backed by Beijing, Wang said, declining to list any investments by name.翻译:王表示，重阳转而购买防御性高股息股票、具有全球竞争力的医疗创新公司以及北京支持的先进制造业，但他拒绝透露任何投资的名称。

This follows China's blue chip CSI300 index (.CSI300) sinking to five-year lows and losing 12% over 2023 against a 15% gain for global stocks (.MIWD00000PUS) as the Chinese economy struggled with a property crunch and a slow recovery from COVID-19.翻译:在此之前，中国蓝筹股沪深 300 指数(.CSI300)跌至五年低点，并在 2023 年下跌 12%，而全球股市(.MIWD00000PUS)则上涨 15%，原因是中国经济因房地产紧缩和从新冠疫情中缓慢复苏而苦苦挣扎。 -19。

Hong Kong's Hang Seng (.HSI) fared even worse, sliding more than 18% to trade on a forward price-to-earnings ratio below six, against 21 for the S&P 500 (.SPX).翻译:香港恒生指数(.HSI)的表现更糟，下跌超过 18%，远期市盈率低于 6，而标准普尔 500 指数(.SPX)则为 21。

Performance over the last 10 months crushed the optimism that infused the beginning of the year, with four straight months of foreign outflows in the second half of the year totalling a net 138 billion yuan ($19 billion) withdrawn from Chinese equities via the Stock Connect scheme.翻译:过去 10 个月的表现粉碎了年初的乐观情绪，下半年外资连续四个月通过沪港通计划从中国股市净撤资达 1,380 亿元人民币（合 190 亿美元） 。

"Investors (have) struggled to think what the next growth driver for China will be," said Caroline Yu Maurer, head of China and specialised Asia strategies at HSBC Asset Management.翻译:汇丰资产管理公司中国及亚洲专业策略主管卡罗琳·于毛雷尔(Caroline Yu Maurer)表示：“投资者一直在努力思考中国的下一个增长动力是什么。”

Goldman analysts target 4,200 for the CSI300 (.CSI300) by the end of 2024, up 23% from Monday's close at 3,419. Morgan Stanley forecasts the blue chip index at 3,850 at the end of next year and the Hang Seng (.HSI) - which finished Monday at 16,201 - at 18,500, up 14%.翻译:高盛分析师的目标是到 2024 年底沪深 300 指数(.CSI300) 达到4,200 点，较周一收盘价 3,419 点上涨 23%。摩根士丹利预计蓝筹股指数到明年年底将达到 3,850 点，而恒生指数(.HSI)周一收于 16,201 点，预计将上涨 14% 至 18,500 点。

In contrast, Goldman sees the S&P 500 (.SPX) up less than 2% from current levels to 4,700 by the end of next year. Morgan Stanley sees it falling to 4,500.

EXPORTERS AND MULTINATIONALS

Real estate is casting the longest shadow. The sector that once accounted for a quarter of China's economy is reeling from a series of developer failures and a crisis of confidence that fund managers want to see resolved before they commit capital.翻译:房地产业的阴影最为深远。这个曾经占中国经济四分之一的行业正因一系列开发商倒闭和信心危机而陷入困境，基金经理希望在投入资金之前解决这些问题。

Moody's slapped a downgrade warning on China's credit rating last week, in part due to the property malaise. Shares of Country Garden (2007.HK), once China's biggest private property developer and now battling to service its debt, are down 73% this year.翻译:穆迪上周对中国信用评级发出下调警告，部分原因是房地产市场低迷。碧桂园（2007.HK）曾经是中国最大的私营房地产开发商，目前正在努力偿还债务，今年其股价已下跌 73%。

The Hang Seng index of mainland developers (.HSMPI) is down 44%.翻译:内地开发商恒生指数(.HSMPI)下跌 44%。

With the property shock ricocheting through the economy and dampened consumption, Morgan Stanley estimates the number of MSCI China companies missing analyst earnings expectations in the third quarter was the most since 2018.翻译:随着房地产冲击波及经济并抑制消费，摩根士丹利估计第三季度未达到分析师盈利预期的 MSCI 中国公司数量为 2018 年以来最多。

New York hedge fund Indus Capital Partners is among several investors turning away from exposure to China's domestic demand.翻译:纽约对冲基金 Indus Capital Partners 是几家放弃投资中国内需的投资者之一。

We see value in "some exporters and multinationals, and cheap (state-owned enterprises) aligned with and otherwise not of great concern to the government," said Indus partner John Pinkel, without naming specific companies.翻译:Indus 合伙人约翰·平克尔 (John Pinkel) 表示，我们看到了“一些出口商和跨国公司以及与政府结盟的廉价企业（国有企业）的价值”，但他没有透露具体公司的名称。

The stock of PDD, which owns U.S.-based shopping app Temu, for example, is up 75%. Discount retailer Miniso (9896.HK) also has a global footprint and its shares are up 80% this year.翻译:例如，拥有美国购物应用 Temu 的拼多多 (PDD) 的股价上涨了 75%。折扣零售商名创优品（9896.HK）的足迹也遍布全球，今年其股价上涨了80%。

Global asset manager Invesco is overweight on Chinese assets in its Asian portfolios, and strategist David Chao highlighted the attractiveness of global expansion, citing the success of Japanese companies abroad while growth slowed at home.翻译:全球资产管理公司景顺(Invesco)在其亚洲投资组合中增持了中国资产，策略师赵大伟(David Chao)强调了全球扩张的吸引力，理由是日本公司在海外取得了成功，而国内增长却放缓了。

To be sure, there are bargain hunters.翻译:可以肯定的是，有一些讨价还价的人。

Wenli Zheng, a portfolio manager at T. Rowe Price, says shipmakers have record orderbooks and the timing is ideal to buy good but perceived economically sensitive companies that are trading cheaply, such as Kanzhun (2076.HK), a recruiter, or mall operator China Resources Mixc Lifestyle (1209.HK).翻译:T. Rowe Price的投资组合经理郑文丽表示，造船商的订单量创历史新高，现在是买入价格便宜但被认为对经济敏感的优质公司的理想时机，例如招聘公司或购物中心运营商看准（2076.HK）华润万象生活（1209.HK） 。

Jefferies said it has turned "tactically positive" on China given an appreciating yuan and cheap valuations, and LSEG data shows sellside analysts think Chinese firms will see their strongest earnings expansion in seven years in 2024.翻译:杰富瑞 (Jefferies) 表示，鉴于人民币升值和估值低廉，该公司已对中国采取“策略上的积极态度”，伦敦证交所 (LSEG) 数据显示， 卖方分析师认为，中国企业将在 2024 年实现七年来最强劲的盈利扩张。

Yet BofA Securities' November survey of 265 Asia fund managers found a majority are either waiting for improvement or looking elsewhere, suggesting no rush to add to their exposure to China.翻译:然而，美国银行证券公司 11 月份对 265 名亚洲基金经理的调查发现，大多数人要么等待改善，要么寻找其他地方，这表明他们并不急于增加在中国的投资。

($1 = 7.1872 yuan)翻译:(1 美元 = 7.1872 元)
